#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked

void inline read(long long int &x){

	x=0;
	char register  c=gc();
	for(;c<'0'  || c>'9'; c=gc());

	for(;c>='0' && c<='9';c=gc()){

		x=(x<<3)+(x<<1)+(c-'0');
	}
	return ;
}
void write(long long int P){

	char buffor[35];
	int i=-1;

	do{
		buffor[++i]=P%10+'0';
		P/=10;
	} while(P);
	while(i>=0) putchar_unlocked(buffor[i--]);
	putchar_unlocked('\n');
	return ;
}
int main(){

	long long int i,N,sum=0;
	read(N);

	for(i=1;i<=N;i++) sum+=i*(N/i);
	write(sum);
	return 0;
}
